item.title: What is This?
item.description: What is the purpose of this website? The combination of the URL & blog name, the sidebar description and this nobody writer all reveal nothing about what this place is. I think the best way to summarize really what this site is: this website is a personal blog which can vary from some common topics that I think about like politics and video games (development sometimes!) to macroeconomics and marriage all in the pursuit of “developing” better writing. I don’t really know what I am going to talk about on each given post.
